activities: Sunrise Medical receives personal information from the European Union to the extent necessary to: Establish and manage the employment relationship, including but not limited to staffing, compensation, benefits, education, training, performance management and development, employee relations, organizational development and payroll functions; comply with tax, labor law or union agreements; fulfill legal, contractual and compliance related obligations; manage access to, and use of, corporate networks and applications, including supporting host country access to host country employment data; provide information security; conduct other employment related functions such as aaccounting, audits, and investigations concerning possible breaches of law or company policy.
eucountries: Austria, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
